contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 10, 1901 D Rochdale Contest
Rochdale Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Rochdale Annual Brass Band Festival rochdale-contest
Own Choice from a Specified List
Drill Hall, Rochdale Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, March contest - 1st Todmorden, 2nd Irwell Springs Choice of test pieces: "Belisario", "Crispino", or "Songs of Scotland". 4th annual contest promoted by Rochdale Public Band. 9 bands competed
Oct. 21, 2013, 12:35 p.m. June 25, 2018, 8:43 a.m.
1 Irwell Springs William Rimmer Songs of Scotland
2 Boarshurst Silver Band Alexander Owen Songs of Scotland
3 Irwell Bank Alexander Owen Songs of Scotland
4 Todmorden Old Band Christopher Smith Belisario [arr. Round]
5 Lower Ince Temperance William Rimmer Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Atherton Public Prize Band William Rimmer Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Westhoughton Old Christopher Smith Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Pendleton Old William Rimmer Belisario [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Millgate Christopher Smith Belisario [arr. Round]
